title: All the Backlist! May 20, 2022
description:
This week, Tirzah recommend two great YA titles with mental health representation.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or Stitcher and never miss a beat book.

Books Discussed:
Darius the Great is Not Okay by Adib Khorram
Darius the Great Deserves Better by Adib Khorram
The Edge of Anything by Nora Shalaway Carpenter
